manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cascade Platinum Dishwasher Cleaner, 3 count Remove limescale buildup, grease, and odors from your dishwasher with Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner. Cycle after cycle, your dishwasher machine can develop unsightly deposits, buildup, and odors. Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner helps eliminate odors and break through the buildup to reveal a fresher, cleaner dishwasher machine. Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner comes in easy-to-use, single-dose pacs. Simply toss one in and run a cycle to keep your dishwasher machine clean and as fresh as it should be. For best results, use Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner once a month to keep your dishwasher machine sparkling. Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner helps eliminate odors and remove limescale buildup and grease to reveal a fresher, cleaner machineSimply toss it in your empty dishwasher and run a cycle—just like Cascade ActionPacsUse once a month to help keep your machine sparklingRecommended by Cascade DetergentFor best results, use with Cascade Dishwasher Detergent and Cascade Power Dry Rinse Aid

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a thorough job of cleaning my dishwasher.
reviews.reviewText: This couldn't be easier! Just throw a pack into the bottom of the dishwasher or into the pod tray, let it run for a Normal Cycle, and the dishwasher will be fully washed and ready for your next load of dishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works very well and gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does the job.
reviews.reviewText: The item is as described. It is easy to use following the instructions, and it does a great cleaning work on the dishwasher. Price is a little high but the value is there, no doubt!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars WHY FOUR STARS -
reviews.reviewText: PROS:DOES THE JOB - I use when dishwasher starts to smell in between washes - IT DOES keep it smelling fresh IN BETWEEN washes, with dirty dishes in it (I run dishwasher every other day)PRICE - OK, A LITTLE PRICIER than Walmart, but only by about a couple buck AND I can get it delivered free with Prime. I pay about six bucks and change at Walmart, I paid about eight and change here. Considering I am isolating, well worth the couple bucks to have delivered.LENGTH IT LASTS - Keeps my dishwasher smelling good for about THREE weeks, if I'm lucky. A little disappointed in longevity.CONS: SCENT is strong and I am sensitive to scent. But the strong scent starts to dissipate after a few washes. IF you are sensitive to scent, after you run the dishwasher with the pod in it, before you open the dishwasher, open some windows and take a deep breath, bolt out of the room and go to another room til it cools down. It also doesn't last as long as I would like, I need to use about every three weeks and I run dishwasher every other day and rinse dishes lightly before I put in dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Problems with Dishwasher Odors
reviews.reviewText: I have a new dishwasher and after about 3 months of use, I noticed odors which got progressively worse and also seemed to adhere to the clean dishes. I did all the home remedies from cleaning all the individual parts, vinegar cycles, super hot washes, etc… nothing worked. As a result, I decided to give this a try and after just one wash, the odors were gone and haven’t come back. I can’t say enough good things about this product. I only wish it was cheaper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exactly what is expected of for this product
reviews.reviewText: works great, the scent is good during wash cycle and it's very easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy. Misleading product.
reviews.reviewText: Only one pod for $11.00 is crazy! Not a satisfied customer. Sure it does a good job but to expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works against old smells!
reviews.reviewText: My dishwasher had a horrid smell from not draining right for quite a while. When we got it fixed, I ran it thru a rinse cycle to make sure it would work and drain (it did). Then, I ran it thru a normal wash with soap. It was better but still had a “stale dishwasher” smell. I ordered this stuff and used it and my dishwasher has never smelled this clean and fresh and just good!! It looks sparkly, too! I highly recommend it!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Rip off, 17.99 for one little pack. Picture is very misleading
reviews.reviewText: Thought I was getting 1 pack that contained multiple use packs not just 1 pack for 17.99 Big RIP OFF to anybody.
La descripcion menciona 2 mas 1 paquetes, sin embargo solo se recibio 1.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nothing special about this product, I don’t see any difference
Se supone que son dos, y solo llego uno. Van a mandar el otro?
reviews.reviewText: No se todavía no lo uso, falta uno, se supone que SON DOS
Je n'ai pas vu de différence après le nettoyage de la machine ... je trouve très cher pour un aussi petit produit..
